author: pipermerriam
content: <@!194432762315407360> I'm curious if there are any active topics of research with respect to discv5 network topic system or if there's a place where someone could contribute to that part of the network design?

author: .fjl
content: we're doing that in this repo: https://github.com/datahop/p2p-service-discovery

author: .fjl
content: the repo contains a network simulator, built using peersim, that implements the topic system

author: .fjl
content: also, there are many reports with simulation outputs

author: .fjl
content: we also have some python-based simulations for the topic table

author: .fjl
content: at the moment, we are still discussing some last-minute adjustments to the waiting time formula

author: .fjl
content: the next major milestone of the research project is actually just writing the paper and submitting it for peer review
